#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int


ll cald(ll a)
{
	ll sum=0;
	while(a>0)
	{	
	if((a%10)%2==0)
	sum=sum+(2*(a%10));
	else
	sum=sum+a%10;
	a=a/10;
	}
//	cout<<"\n"<<sum<<"\n";
	return sum%10;
}

int main()
{

	ll a,b,sum;
	int t,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sum=0;
		scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
		if(b-a>10)
		{
			while(a%10>0&&a%10<=9)
			{
				
				
					sum=sum+cald(a);
					a++;
				
				
			}
		}
		
		
		while(a+10<=b)
		{
			sum=sum+45;
			a+=10;
		
		}

		while(a<b)
		{
			sum+=cald(a);
			a++;
		}
		
		if(a==b)
		sum+=cald(a);
		
		
		printf("%lld\n",sum);
			
	}
	return 0;
	
}
